00046 class MoveablePointer
00047 {
00049   void* ptr;
00050 public:
00052   MoveablePointer(const MoveablePointer& b);
00053   
00055   void operator=(const MoveablePointer& b);
00056 
00058   explicit MoveablePointer(void* ptr);
00059 
00061   explicit MoveablePointer(const MoveablePointer& mp, int offset);
00062 
00064 
00067   void* get_ptr_noCheck() const
00068   { return ptr; }
00069 
00071   void* get_ptr() const
00072 #ifndef SLOW_DEBUG
00073   { return ptr; }
00074 #else
00075     ; // Defined at bottom of file.
00076 #endif
00077 
00078   bool is_null() const
00079   { return ptr == NULL; }
00080 
00084   void set_raw_ptr(void* _ptr) 
00085   { 
00086     ptr = _ptr; 
00087   }
00088   
00090   MoveablePointer getOffset(unsigned bytes)
00091   { 
00092     return MoveablePointer(((char*)ptr) + bytes); 
00093   }
00094 
00096   MoveablePointer() : ptr(NULL)
00097   { }
00098   
00100   ~MoveablePointer();
00101 };

00104 template<typename T>
00105 class MoveableArray
00106 {
00108   MoveablePointer ptr;
00110   unsigned size;
00111   
00112 public:
00114 
00116   explicit MoveableArray(MoveablePointer _ptr, unsigned _size) : ptr(_ptr), size(_size)
00117   { }
00118 
00119   MoveableArray()
00120   {}
00121 
00122   // A common C++ requiement - declaring two identical methods, one for const, one without.
00123   
00124   T& operator[](int pos)
00125   { 
00126     D_ASSERT(pos >= 0 && pos < size);
00127     return *(static_cast<T*>(ptr.get_ptr()) + pos);
00128   }
00129 
00130   const T& operator[](int pos) const
00131   { 
00132     D_ASSERT(pos >= 0 && pos < size);
00133     return *(static_cast<T*>(ptr.get_ptr()) + pos);
00134   }
00135 
00137   T* get_ptr()
00138   { return static_cast<T*>(ptr.get_ptr()); }
00139 
00141   const T* get_ptr() const
00142   { return static_cast<const T*>(ptr.get_ptr()); }
00143 };

00154 class MemBlockCache
00155 {
00156   // Forbid copying this type!
00157   MemBlockCache(const MemBlockCache&);
00158   void operator=(const MemBlockCache&);
00159   vector<NewMemoryBlock*> NewMemoryBlockCache;
00160   
00161 #ifdef THREADSAFE
00162   boost::mutex m;
00163 #define LOCK(M) boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(M)
00164 #else
00165 #define LOCK(M)
00166 #endif
00167 
00168 public:    
00169   
00170   MemBlockCache() { }
00171   
00172 
00173 
00174   void registerNewMemoryBlock(NewMemoryBlock* mb)
00175   { 
00176     LOCK(m);
00177     D_ASSERT(find(NewMemoryBlockCache.begin(), NewMemoryBlockCache.end(), mb) == NewMemoryBlockCache.end());
00178     NewMemoryBlockCache.push_back(mb); 
00179   }
00180 
00181   void unregisterNewMemoryBlock(NewMemoryBlock* mb)
00182   { 
00183     LOCK(m);
00184     vector<NewMemoryBlock*>::iterator it = find(NewMemoryBlockCache.begin(), NewMemoryBlockCache.end(), mb);
00185     D_ASSERT(it != NewMemoryBlockCache.end());
00186     NewMemoryBlockCache.erase(it); 
00187   }
00188 
00189   inline void addPointerToNewMemoryBlock(MoveablePointer* vp);
00190 
00191   inline void removePointerFromNewMemoryBlock(MoveablePointer* vp);
00192 
00193   inline bool checkPointerValid(const MoveablePointer*const vp);
00194   
00195   bool empty()
00196   { LOCK(m); return NewMemoryBlockCache.empty(); }
00197   void clear()
00198   { LOCK(m); NewMemoryBlockCache.clear(); }
00199 };
00200 
00201 VARDEF(MemBlockCache memBlockCache);

00212 class NewMemoryBlock
00213 {
00215   NewMemoryBlock(const NewMemoryBlock&);
00217   void operator=(const NewMemoryBlock&);
00218   
00219   char* current_data;
00220   unsigned allocated_bytes;
00221   unsigned maximum_bytes;
00222   bool lock_m;
00223   bool final_lock_m;
00224   SET_TYPE<MoveablePointer*> pointers;
00225 public:
00226   
00228   char* getDataPtr()
00229   { return current_data; }
00230 
00232   unsigned getDataSize()
00233   { return allocated_bytes; }
00234 
00235   NewMemoryBlock() : current_data(NULL), allocated_bytes(0), maximum_bytes(0),
00236                   lock_m(false), final_lock_m(false)
00237   { memBlockCache.registerNewMemoryBlock(this);}
00238   
00239   ~NewMemoryBlock()
00240   { 
00241     memBlockCache.unregisterNewMemoryBlock(this);
00242     free(current_data);
00243   }
00244   
00246   MoveablePointer request_bytes(unsigned byte_count)
00247   {
00248     if(byte_count == 0)
00249       return MoveablePointer(NULL);
00250       
00251     // TODO: is the following line necessary?
00252     if(byte_count % sizeof(int) != 0)
00253       byte_count += sizeof(int) - (byte_count % sizeof(int));
00254 
00255     D_ASSERT(!lock_m);
00256     if(maximum_bytes < allocated_bytes + byte_count)
00257     { reallocate( (allocated_bytes + byte_count) * 2 ); }
00258 
00259     char* return_val = current_data + allocated_bytes;
00260     allocated_bytes += byte_count;
00261     return MoveablePointer(return_val);
00262   }
00263 
00265   template<typename T>
00266   MoveableArray<T> requestArray(unsigned size)
00267   {
00268     MoveablePointer ptr = request_bytes(size * sizeof(T));
00269     return MoveableArray<T>(ptr, size);
00270   }
00271 
00272 
00274   void reallocate(unsigned byte_count)
00275   {
00276     D_ASSERT(!lock_m);
00277     D_ASSERT(byte_count >= allocated_bytes);
00278     char* new_data = (char*)malloc(byte_count);
00279     memset(new_data, 0, byte_count);
00280 
00281     for(SET_TYPE<MoveablePointer*>::iterator it = pointers.begin(); it != pointers.end(); ++it)
00282     {
00283       D_ASSERT((*it)->get_ptr() >= current_data && (*it)->get_ptr() < current_data + allocated_bytes);
00284       (*it)->set_raw_ptr( ((char*)((*it)->get_ptr()) - current_data) + new_data );
00285     }
00286    
00287     // TODO: Search codebase for memcpy, use realloc instead if possible.
00288     memcpy(new_data, current_data, allocated_bytes);
00289     free(current_data);
00290     current_data = new_data;
00291     maximum_bytes = byte_count;
00292   }
00293 
00295   bool checkAddToTracker(MoveablePointer* vp)
00296   {
00297     D_ASSERT(!final_lock_m);
00298     void* ptr = vp->get_ptr_noCheck();
00299     if(ptr < current_data || ptr >= current_data + allocated_bytes)
00300       return false;
00301     else
00302     {
00303       pointers.insert(vp);
00304       return true;
00305     }
00306   }
00307 
00309   bool checkRemoveFromTracker(MoveablePointer* vp)
00310   {
00311     void* ptr = vp->get_ptr_noCheck();
00312     if(ptr < current_data || ptr >= current_data + allocated_bytes)
00313       return false;
00314     else
00315     {
00316       pointers.erase(vp);
00317       return true;
00318     }
00319   }
00320 
00322   /* Used only in debug mode for validation. Should never fail. */
00323   bool checkPointerValid(const MoveablePointer*const vp)
00324   {
00325     void* ptr = vp->get_ptr_noCheck();
00326 
00327     bool check1 = (pointers.count(const_cast<MoveablePointer*>(vp)) > 0);
00328     bool check2 = (ptr >= current_data && ptr < current_data + allocated_bytes);
00329     if(check1 != check2)
00330     {
00331       D_FATAL_ERROR("Fatal Memory corruption - pointer broken!");
00332     }
00333     return check1;
00334   }
00335 
00336   // TODO: Remove
00337   void final_lock()
00338   { 
00339     D_ASSERT(lock_m);
00340     final_lock_m = true;
00341   }
00342   
00343   void lock()
00344   {
00345     reallocate(allocated_bytes);
00346     lock_m = true;
00347   }
00348    
00349 };

00353 inline MoveablePointer::MoveablePointer(const MoveablePointer& b) : ptr(b.ptr)
00354 {
00355   if(ptr != NULL)
00356     memBlockCache.addPointerToNewMemoryBlock(this);
00357 }
00358 
00359 inline void MoveablePointer::operator=(const MoveablePointer& b)
00360 {
00361   if(ptr != NULL)
00362     memBlockCache.removePointerFromNewMemoryBlock(this);
00363   ptr = b.ptr;
00364   if(ptr != NULL)
00365     memBlockCache.addPointerToNewMemoryBlock(this);
00366 }
00367 
00368 inline MoveablePointer::MoveablePointer(void* _ptr) : ptr(_ptr)
00369 {
00370   if(ptr != NULL)
00371     memBlockCache.addPointerToNewMemoryBlock(this);
00372 }
00373 
00374 inline MoveablePointer::~MoveablePointer()
00375 {
00376 #ifndef SLOW_DEBUG
00377   D_ASSERT(memBlockCache.checkPointerValid(this));
00378 #endif
00379   if(ptr != NULL)
00380     memBlockCache.removePointerFromNewMemoryBlock(this);
00381 }
00382 
00383 inline MoveablePointer::MoveablePointer(const MoveablePointer& b, int offset) : ptr(((char*)b.ptr) + offset)
00384 {
00385   D_ASSERT(b.get_ptr() != NULL);
00386   memBlockCache.addPointerToNewMemoryBlock(this);
00387 }
00388 
00389 
00390 #ifdef SLOW_DEBUG
00391 inline void* MoveablePointer::get_ptr() const
00392 {
00393   D_ASSERT(memBlockCache.checkPointerValid(this));
00394   return ptr;
00395 }
00396 #endif
00397 
00398 inline void MemBlockCache::addPointerToNewMemoryBlock(MoveablePointer* vp)
00399   {
00400     LOCK(m);
00401     if(vp->get_ptr_noCheck() == NULL)
00402       return;
00403 
00404     for(vector<NewMemoryBlock*>::iterator it = NewMemoryBlockCache.begin();
00405         it != NewMemoryBlockCache.end();
00406         ++it)
00407     {
00408       if((*it)->checkAddToTracker(vp))
00409         return;
00410     }
00411     D_FATAL_ERROR("Fatal Memory Corruption when adding to tracker!");
00412   }
00413 
00414   inline void MemBlockCache::removePointerFromNewMemoryBlock(MoveablePointer* vp)
00415   {
00416     LOCK(m);
00417     for(vector<NewMemoryBlock*>::iterator it = NewMemoryBlockCache.begin();
00418         it != NewMemoryBlockCache.end();
00419         ++it)
00420     {
00421       if((*it)->checkRemoveFromTracker(vp))
00422         return;
00423     }
00424     //D_FATAL_ERROR("Fatal Memory Corruption when leaving the tracker");
00425   }
00426 
00427   inline bool MemBlockCache::checkPointerValid(const MoveablePointer *const vp)
00428   {
00429     LOCK(m);
00430     if(vp->get_ptr_noCheck() == NULL)
00431       return true;
00432     for(vector<NewMemoryBlock*>::iterator it = NewMemoryBlockCache.begin();
00433         it != NewMemoryBlockCache.end();
00434         ++it)
00435     {
00436       if((*it)->checkPointerValid(vp))
00437         return true;
00438     }
00439     ;
00440     D_FATAL_ERROR("Fatal Memory Error - invalid Pointer deferenced!");
00441   }
